definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: Impedance transformer is one kind of main equipment of track circuit in electrification district.
sentences.chinese: 扼流變壓器是電化區段構成軌道電路的主要設備之一。

sentences.english: The early failure phenomena of flyback transformer was discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文章就回掃變壓器的早期失效現象進行了探討。

sentences.english: Midcom is the world's top producer of telecommunications transformers.
sentences.chinese: 明康是世界級的通訊變壓器生產商。

sentences.english: The transformer has a primary coil and a secondary coil.
sentences.chinese: 變壓器有一個初級線圈和次級線圈。

sentences.english: An on-line monitoring system of ultra-high-frequency (UHF) PD was investigated for transformers in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了變壓器局部放電特高頻在線監測系統。

sentences.english: Its input transformer adopts phase-shift technology to implement a multiplex rectifier.
sentences.chinese: 其輸入變壓器採用移相技術，以實現多重化整流。

sentences.english: Therefore S11 reel iron core transformer has good property for guard against theft.
sentences.chinese: 因此，S11卷鐵芯變壓器具有很好的防盜性。

sentences.english: The safety and reliability of color tv set depend on flyback transformer to a great extent.
sentences.chinese: 彩電的安全性與可靠性很大程度上決定於回掃變壓器。

sentences.english: Acting as an important accessories of transformer, the bushing should have a lower dielectric loss.
sentences.chinese: 套管作爲變壓器的配套件，其介損應當較低。

sentences.english: Power-transfer transformers, choke coils, communication standby transformers.
sentences.chinese: 電源轉換用變壓器及扼流圈，通訊設備用變壓器。

sentences.english: Power-transfer transformers, choke coils, communication standby transformers.
sentences.chinese: 電源轉換用變壓器及扼流圈，通訊設備用變壓器。

sentences.english: Optimum design of movable core shunting arc welding transformer is carried out in the present paper.
sentences.chinese: 對動鐵分磁式弧焊變壓器進行了優化設計。

sentences.english: Shaft-angle two-phase method coding of resolver is a calculating method or reading list method.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉變壓器二相法軸角編碼是一種計算法或查表法。

sentences.english: The omnibus bar of each set is connected with main transformer through its omnibus bar cave.
sentences.chinese: 每臺機組母線通過各自的母線洞與主變壓器連接。

sentences.english: Succeed in developping SCB9 type resin thin type.
sentences.chinese: 成功研製開發了SCB10型樹脂薄絕緣乾式變壓器。

sentences.english: A system of moisture measuring in pressboard during drying is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了正在研製中的變壓器絕緣紙板水分測試系統。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
